Hey thanks for visiting my website. My name is Joseph and I am studying data analytics. I enjoy snooping for datasets and making visualizations from them. D3 is awesome because its browser based and easy to share with others. I also can't draw so its nice to be able to do something artistic for once.

Natural language processing fascinates me. I've learned how to recognize patterns and analyze text sequences in English. I am working on applying this to Malayalam, a language that has a different approach to sentence construction.
